from collections import Counter
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    ans = 0
    for (x, y) in Counter(a).items():
        ans += y - 1
    print(ans)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr.sort()
    different = arr[0]
    count = 0
    for i in range(n - 1):
        if arr[i] == arr[i + 1]:
            arr[i] += different
            different = arr[i]
            count += 1
    print(count)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().strip().split()))
    l.sort()
    count = 0
    for i in range(n - 1):
        if l[i] == l[i + 1]:
            count += 1
    print(count)
    t -= 1

t = int(input())
from collections import Counter
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    lst = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))
    xl = Counter(lst)
    val = [xl[i] - 1 for i in xl if xl[i] > 1]
    print(sum(val))
